Entry.it-IT: Evento per sedare il dissenso religioso

Entry.en-US: The Quell Religious Dissent Mission of {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} has led to an event...
Entry.it-IT: La missione "Sedare il dissenso religioso" di {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} ha portato a un evento...

Entry.en-US: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} met with the dissatisfied leaders and reports that the Religious Dissent has been dispersed.
Entry.it-IT: {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} ha incontrato i leader insoddisfatti e riferisce che il dissenso religioso è stato disperso.

Entry.en-US: The Make Clergy Mission of {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} has led to an event...
Entry.it-IT: La missione Make Clergy di {CHARACTER-SUBJECT} ha portato ad un evento...

Entry.en-US: {CHARACTER-TARGET} has been inducted into the clergy
